channel.title: CVE Feed for BlueStacks -- App Player
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlueStacks -- App Player

item.title: CVE-2016-4288|2024-08-06T00:25:13.792Z -- bluestacks -- app%20player
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability exists in BlueStacks App Player. The BlueStacks App Player installer creates a registry key with weak permissions that allows users to execute arbitrary programs with SYSTEM privileges.
